item.title: 9 reasons to have soybean for dinner - The Times of India
item.description:
9 Reasons to Include Soybeans in Your Dinner

Publication Date: Dec 22, 2024 Source: Times of India

Soybeans are highly nutritious and can significantly enhance your dinner experience. They offer various health benefits and are versatile in various recipes.

  • High in plant-based protein (about 36 grams per 100 grams).
  • Good source of vitamins and minerals (iron, magnesium, potassium, folate).
  • Supports heart health by lowering bad cholesterol levels.
  • Promotes bone strength with high calcium content.
  • Improves digestion due to high dietary fiber content (9.3 grams per 100 grams).
  • Helps balance hormones with isoflavones.
  • Aids muscle recovery post-exercise.
  • Versatile and can be used in multiple dishes (tofu, soy milk, etc.).
  • Helps with weight control by keeping you fuller longer.
"Soy isoflavones mimic estrogen, thus aiding in hormonal balance and offering huge benefits for menopausal women."

In conclusion, incorporating soybeans into your diet not only adds variety to your meals but also contributes to your overall health.

item.title: Proxy advisors call for Rashmi Saluja's ouster from Religare; co backs her | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Proxy Advisors Urge Shareholders to Oust Rashmi Saluja from Religare's Board

Publication Date: N/ASource: Company Business News

Two leading proxy advisory firms have recommended Religare Enterprises investors Ltd (REL) to vote against giving a fresh five-year term on the company's board to chairperson Rashmi Saluja, amidst her ongoing conflict with the company's largest shareholders, the Burman family.

  • Proxy advisory firms are pushing investors to reject Saluja's re-appointment.
  • Her leadership is challenged due to a feud with the Burman family, the largest shareholders.
  • The decision comes as her re-appointment was already uncertain.
“Proxy advisors play a crucial role in shaping corporate governance outcomes,” said an industry expert.

This situation highlights the influence of proxy advisors in corporate governance and raises questions about Saluja's future at Religare.

item.title: What Happened Between Blake Lively And Justin Baldoni? A Full Breakdown Of The 'It Ends With Us' Feud - News18
item.description:
What Happened Between Blake Lively And Justin Baldoni? A Full Breakdown Of The 'It Ends With Us' Feud

Date: December 22, 2024

Source: News18

The lawsuit filed by Blake Lively against Justin Baldoni has sent shockwaves through Hollywood, revealing significant tensions and a toxic work environment during the production of their film, 'It Ends With Us'.

  • Blake Lively alleges sexual harassment by Justin Baldoni during the filming.
  • The film, released amidst rumors and on-set tensions, grossed $350 million worldwide.
  • Reports surfaced alleging difficulties in production, including creative conflicts and behavioral misconduct.
  • Colleen Hoover, author of the novel, expressed support for Lively amidst the allegations.
  • After the lawsuit, Baldoni's talent agency dropped him as a client.
“I hope that my legal action helps pull back the curtain on these sinister retaliatory tactics… and helps protect others who may be targeted.” - Blake Lively

This ongoing situation highlights the need for safer working environments in the film industry and has sparked significant public discussion.

item.title: What's Getting Cheaper And Costlier After GST Council Meeting? Check Full List - News18
item.description:
What's Getting Cheaper And Costlier After GST Council Meeting? Check Full List

Date: December 22, 2024 Source: News18

The GST Council's 55th meeting led by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman reviewed and made significant changes to GST rates, impacting various goods and services.

  • Reduction in GST on Fortified Rice Kernel (FRK) to 5% to enhance affordability.
  • Full GST exemption on gene therapy to improve accessibility.
  • Exemption for contributions to the Motor Vehicle Accident Fund from GST.
  • No GST on transactions involving vouchers.
  • No GST on penal charges levied by banks and NBFCs for non-compliance.
  • Reduction in pre-deposit for appeals regarding penalty amounts.
“The GST Council aims to provide relief to individuals and streamline compliance,” remarked Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman.

This meeting signifies an effort to enhance the economic landscape by adjusting tax rates strategically to support various sectors.

item.title: Allu Arjun's father talks about their Hyderabad home being vandalised over Pushpa 2 stampede case - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Vandalism at Allu Arjun's Home After Pushpa 2 Incident

Date: Dec 22, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Allu Arjun's father, Allu Aravind, addressed the press after protesters vandalized their Hyderabad home, demanding money for a victim of a recent stampede at a film event. The police have arrested the offenders and are prepared for further actions.

  • The incident occurred due to demands related to a stampede at a film event promoting Pushpa 2.
  • Protesters vandalized the property, breaking flower pots and pelting tomatoes.
  • Allu Arjun stated he was unaware of the woman’s death until the next day after the event.
“Everyone has seen what happened at our house today. But it is time for us to act accordingly. Now is not the right time for us to react to anything.” - Allu Aravind

In conclusion, the incident underscores the intense pressure facing celebrities following tragic events and the public's expectation for accountability.

item.title: Brazil: Aircraft crashes into shops in tourist city of Gramado, all 10 passengers feared dead - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aircraft Crashes into Shops in Gramado, Brazil, Leaving All Passengers Feared Dead

Date: Dec 22, 2024

Source: HT News Desk

A small aircraft carrying 10 passengers crashed into shops in Gramado, Brazil, with all passengers expected to be deceased. The incident seems particularly devastating as it happened just days before Christmas, a major tourist period for the city.

  • The aircraft struck a building's chimney before hitting a furniture store.
  • Governor Eduardo Leite has been monitoring the situation and mobilizing municipal resources for rapid response.
  • Fifteen people unrelated to the crash suffered injuries from smoke inhalation related to the subsequent fire.
  • The crash follows a year marked by devastating floods in the region that already caused significant disruption.
“Unfortunately, initial information indicates that the occupants of the aircraft did not survive,” - Governor Eduardo Leite.

This tragic incident underscores the ongoing challenges faced by the region, particularly during one of its busiest tourist seasons.

item.title: Abhijeet Bhattacharya says Mahatma Gandhi was the father of the nation for Pakistan, not India: 'RD Burma - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Abhijeet Bhattacharya says Mahatma Gandhi was the father of the nation for Pakistan, not India: 'RD Burman was bigger than Gandhi'

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Times of India

Playback singer Abhijeet Bhattacharya stirred controversy recently for his remarks regarding Mahatma Gandhi and R.D. Burman during a podcast interview, claiming that Burman was greater than Gandhi and that Gandhi was the father of the nation for Pakistan, not India.

  • Abhijeet referred to R.D. Burman as the 'father of the nation in the world of music'.
  • He stated that Gandhi’s role in the creation of Pakistan is erroneous as Gandhi should be recognized as its father.
  • His comments have faced backlash, igniting debates around Gandhi's legacy and impact on India.
  • Abhijeet also commented on Bollywood stars Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan, praising Shah Rukh but criticizing Salman.
“Mahatma Gandhi was the father of the nation for Pakistan, not India. Gandhi has been mistakenly called the father of the nation for India.”

The singer's remarks have led to polarized reactions among fans and critics, with discussions reignited about his opinions on prominent figures in Bollywood and historical contexts.

item.title: In special gesture, Kuwait’s PM personally sees off PM Modi at airport as he leaves for India - The Times of India
item.description:
Kuwait's PM Sends Off PM Modi at Airport in Special Gesture

Publication Date: [insert date here] Source: [insert source here]

In a warm farewell gesture, Kuwait's Prime Minister personally saw off Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi at the airport as he departed for India.

  • The meeting reflects the strong diplomatic ties between Kuwait and India.
  • This gesture highlights the personal rapport between the leaders.
  • The event signifies ongoing cooperation between the two nations.
"This farewell showcases the deep bond between Kuwait and India," stated a diplomatic source.

This act of diplomacy emphasizes the significance of personal relationships in international relations.

item.title: After Refusing To Travel To Pakistan, India Will Play Champions Trophy Matches At This Venue: Report.. - NDTV Sports
item.description:
India to Play Champions Trophy Matches in Dubai, Not Pakistan

Publication Date: September 9, 2023 Source: NDTV

India has confirmed that they will play their matches in the Champions Trophy at a neutral venue in Dubai, following concerns over security for travel to Pakistan. This decision was made after meetings between cricket officials from the two countries.

  • Dubai selected as the venue for India's Champions Trophy matches.
  • The semi-finals and final are also set to be held in the UAE if India qualifies.
  • The decision follows India's refusal to travel to Pakistan due to security concerns.
  • Hybrid model allows for matches in neutral venues until 2027 for tournaments hosted by either country.
  • The last bilateral engagement between India and Pakistan was in 2012.
“India had refused to travel to Pakistan for the event scheduled in February-March due to security concerns.”

The announcement of the tournament's final schedule is expected soon, with Pakistan set to host 9 to 10 matches.

item.title: 10 dead after plane crashes into shops in southern Brazil, 'no survivors', say authorities - The Times of India
item.description:
10 dead after plane crashes into shops in southern Brazil, 'no survivors', say authorities

Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

A tragic plane crash in southern Brazil has resulted in the deaths of 10 individuals, with authorities confirming no survivors.

  • The crash occurred in a shopping area, raising concerns about public safety.
  • Emergency services were dispatched immediately to the scene.
  • Witnesses reported hearing a loud noise before the impact.
  • Investigations are underway to determine the cause of the accident.
“This is a devastating day for the families affected,” said a local official.

The incident highlights ongoing concerns regarding aviation safety in densely populated areas.

item.title: "I Highlighted It In Parliament": Raghav Chadha On Airport Initiative - NDTV
item.description:
Tea For Rs 10 At Kolkata Airport Soon, Raghav Chadha Says 'Change Brewing'

Date: December 24, 2024   Source: NDTV

The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) MP Raghav Chadha has successfully pushed for lower food and beverage prices at Kolkata airport, with the introduction of the Udaan Yatri Cafe.

  • The Udaan Yatri Cafe offers affordable options like water, tea, and snacks.
  • Chadha highlighted the high prices passengers often face at airports.
  • He emphasized the government's promise of making air travel affordable for common citizens.
  • Chadha received praise for his parliamentary efforts advocating for lower prices.
  • The pilot project may extend to other airports if successful.
“Glad to see the change brewing! After I highlighted the issue of food affordability at airports during this Winter Session of Parliament, tea prices at Kolkata Airport have been reduced. This is a win for us citizens, and I take pride in being the catalyst for this change.” — Raghav Chadha

The Udaan Yatri Cafe aims to provide relief from high airport pricing, and further implementations may follow based on this pilot project's success.

item.title: Allu Arjun's Hyderabad house vandalised by protesters protesters over Pushpa 2 stampede case - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Allu Arjun's Hyderabad House Vandalised by Protesters Over 'Pushpa 2' Stampede

Date: Dec 22, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

On Sunday, protesters vandalised Allu Arjun's Hyderabad home, demanding compensation for victims of a recent stampede linked to the premiere of his film 'Pushpa 2'.

  • Protesters, identifying as OU JAC, vandalised the property in Jubilee Hills.
  • They demanded ₹1 crore for the family of a stampede victim.
  • The protest included pelting stones and breaking flower pots.
  • Eight individuals were arrested at the scene by police.
  • The incident stemmed from a previous stampede at a film premiere that resulted in one death.
“We demand that Allu Arjun take care of the late Revathi’s family. Why did so many film personalities visit him when he came out of jail after being there for 6 months, but none of them cared when a woman died.” - Protester

The tensions between Allu Arjun's fans and the protesters highlight broader issues surrounding celebrity accountability in tragic events.

item.title: Allu Arjun's Hyderabad house vandalised by protesters demanding money for Pushpa 2 stampede victim's family - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Protesters Vandalise Allu Arjun's Hyderabad Home Demanding Compensation for Stampede Victim

Date: December 22, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Protesters from the OU JAC vandalised Allu Arjun's house, demanding he pay ₹1 crore to the family of a stampede victim during the Pushpa 2 premiere.

  • Protesters vandalised Arjun's home in Hyderabad, throwing stones and breaking flower pots.
  • The demands were linked to the tragic death of a woman during the Pushpa 2 premiere.
  • The incident led to several arrests, with the police responding to the vandalism.
“We demand that Allu Arjun take care of the late Revathi’s family... We will not let you go anywhere if these demands aren’t met.”

The incident highlights the ongoing tensions surrounding the Pushpa 2 premiere and raises questions about celebrity accountability.

item.title: What Accenture’s hiring spree means for Indian IT industry | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
What Accenture’s hiring spree means for Indian IT industry

Publication Date: Not specified   |   Source: Live Mint

Accenture Plc’s renewed hiring—it added 49,000 people globally in the last six months—suggests technology services companies expect much better growth in the coming months. This hiring spree paints a positive outlook for homegrown IT services companies that are expected to record better growth in the coming quarters, according to analysts.

  • Accenture added 49,000 employees globally in six months.
  • Analysts suggest better growth prospects for technology services companies.
  • The hiring trend indicates a sanguine outlook for the Indian IT sector.
“Analysts indicated that the move reflects expectations of better growth in the tech sector.”

The hiring activity from Accenture signifies optimism in the tech industry, particularly benefitting Indian IT services firms, leading to an anticipated acceleration in growth.

item.title: Tomotoes Thrown, Protest Outside Allu Arjun's Home Over Stampede Death - NDTV
item.description:
Protest Erupts Outside Allu Arjun's Home Following Stampede Tragedy

Date: December 24, 2024 | Source: NDTV

A large protest occurred outside the residence of film actor Allu Arjun, ignited by a recent stampede at a movie premiere that resulted in a tragic death.

  • The protest was led by individuals claiming to be students from Osmania University.
  • During the protest, demonstrators threw tomatoes and damaged property.
  • The stampede incident happened on December 4 at Sandhya Theatre during the premiere of 'Pushpa 2'.
  • A woman died in the incident, and her eight-year-old son remains hospitalized in a coma.
  • Criticism has been directed at Allu Arjun for allegedly disregarding police orders at the event, which may have contributed to the chaos.
“He had even waved from his car's sun-roof on his way in and out, holding a roadshow of sorts and triggering a stampede-like situation.” - Chief Minister Revanth Reddy

The protest underscores public outrage over the handling of the premiere and the resulting tragedy, highlighting a need for accountability in event management.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 18 early report: Allu Arjun-starrer breaks Baahubali 2’s seven-year domestic record, takes pole position - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection day 18 early report: Allu Arjun-starrer breaks Baahubali 2’s seven-year domestic record, takes pole position

Publication Date: December 5, 2024 Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2 continues to break records, surpassing Baahubali 2's seven-year-old benchmark as the highest-grossing Indian film in the domestic market, marking a remarkable achievement for the film and its cast.

  • The film has crossed the Rs 1000 crore mark in the domestic market, becoming only the second film to do so after Baahubali 2.
  • Pushpa 2 has grossed over Rs 1500 crore globally, making it the highest-grossing film of 2024.
  • Early reports indicate the film earned Rs 22.7 crore on day 18, raising its total to Rs 1052.5 crore.
  • Despite its success, the film faces controversies due to a tragic incident during its premiere in Hyderabad.
“Pushpa 2 continues to mark its strong presence across the country.”

The phenomenal success of Pushpa 2 illustrates its significance in contemporary Indian cinema, reflecting both its popularity and the challenges faced due to surrounding controversies.

item.title: Snack Food Epigamia Founder Rohan Mirchandani Dies Of Cardiac Arrest At 41 - NDTV
item.description:
Rohan Mirchandani, Founder of Snack Food Brand Epigamia, Passes Away at 41

Publication Date: December 24, 2024 | Source: NDTV

Rohan Mirchandani, the founder of the healthy snack foods company Epigamia, has died from cardiac arrest at the age of 41. The company has requested privacy for his family during this time.

  • Mirchandani was the founder of Drums Food International Pvt Ltd, which operates the Epigamia brand.
  • The senior leadership team, including COO Ankur Goel and director Uday Thakker, will continue to manage the company's operations.
  • The board of directors and Mirchandani’s family are supportive of the leadership during this period.
  • Colleagues describe him as a mentor and leader whose vision will guide the company moving forward.
  • Epigamia is known for its commitment to healthy snacks, including its yoghurt and juices made from real fruit.
“Rohan was our mentor, friend, and leader. His vision and values will continue to guide us.” - Ankur Goel and Uday Thakker

Mirchandani's legacy will be cherished by all who knew him and his contributions to the industry are recognized as significant.

This article discusses new information suggesting that iPhones capable of running iOS 18 will also be able to upgrade to iOS 19. It highlights the potential compatibility issues with iPads and notes that official announcements are expected in June 2025.

  • One iPad model set to be dropped with iPadOS 19
  • Expect official news sometime in June 2025
“Not all the new iOS 19 features will be available on all iPhones.”

In conclusion, while many devices are set to receive the updates, there will be limitations based on hardware capabilities.

item.title: Colleen Hoover BREAKS Silence On Blake Lively's Claims Against Justin: 'You Have Been Nothing But...' - News18
item.description:
Colleen Hoover BREAKS Silence On Blake Lively's Claims Against Justin: 'You Have Been Nothing But...'

Date: December 22, 2024 Source: News

Colleen Hoover has publicly supported Blake Lively following allegations of sexual harassment made against Justin Baldoni, the director and co-star of their film, It Ends With Us.

  • Blake Lively accused Justin Baldoni of creating a hostile work environment and filed a lawsuit against him.
  • Colleen Hoover reacted on Instagram, praising Blake's character and honesty.
  • The lawsuit includes specific prohibitions regarding Justin's conduct during the production of the film.
  • Justin Baldoni's representatives have denied the allegations, describing them as categorically false.
"Thank you for being exactly the human that you are. Never change. Never wilt." - Colleen Hoover

This situation highlights ongoing discussions about workplace behavior in the film industry, particularly regarding issues of harassment and support among peers.

item.title: Epigamia co-founder Rohan Mirchandani passes away at 42 due to cardiac arrest - The Times of India
item.description:
Epigamia Co-founder Rohan Mirchandani Dies at 42 from Cardiac Arrest

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

Rohan Mirchandani, the co-founder of the popular Indian yogurt brand Epigamia, passed away at the age of 42 due to cardiac arrest, shocking the startup community.

  • Mirchandani was widely recognized for his contributions to the startup ecosystem.
  • His company, Epigamia, revolutionized the dairy market with innovative products.
  • The news of his sudden demise sparked tributes from fellow entrepreneurs and industry leaders.
“Rohan was an innovator and a visionary. His impact on the dairy industry will be felt for years to come.” - Industry Leader

The untimely death of Rohan Mirchandani highlights the importance of health awareness and brings forth the challenges faced by entrepreneurs in high-stress environments.

item.title: Ursids: How and when to see the last peak meteor shower of 2024 - HT Tech
item.description:
Ursids: How and when to see the last peak meteor shower of 2024

Publication Date: December 2024
Source: Tech Hindustan Times

The Ursid meteor shower is set to light up the skies from December 17 to December 24, peaking around December 23. This annual event provides an opportunity for skywatchers to observe the meteors.

Best Viewing Times for the Ursids

Despite some challenges, the best viewing for the Ursids will occur between midnight and early morning, particularly from 4 to 5 AM ET on December 23. Up to 10 meteors can be seen per hour without the need for special equipment.

Tips for Viewing the Meteor Shower

To increase your chances of spotting meteors, face north with the moon behind you and lie back to get a full view of the sky. It's advisable to stay outside for at least an hour to adjust your eyes to the darkness.

Don't Miss the Quadrantids

If you miss the Ursids, the Quadrantid meteor shower will follow, starting on December 26 and peaking on January 3.

item.title: 8 simple ways to manage your blood pressure during winter - The Times of India
item.description:
8 Simple Ways to Manage Your Blood Pressure During Winter

Publication Date: Not provided Source: Not provided

As winter approaches, many individuals may experience elevated blood pressure due to cold temperatures and increased salt consumption. This article outlines eight ways to manage blood pressure effectively during the winter months.

  • Keep yourself warm by dressing in layers and maintaining a warm home environment.
  • Stay active through regular exercise, even in colder conditions.
  • Adopt a heart-healthy diet rich in fruits, vegetables, and whole grains.
  • Limit salt intake to reduce sodium consumption.
  • Include fruits in your daily diet, particularly potassium-rich options.
  • Practice deep breathing exercises to manage stress.
  • Prioritize good sleep hygiene for overall health.
  • Monitor your blood pressure regularly to manage hypertension effectively.
“By following these eight tips this winter, you can effectively manage your blood pressure and maintain overall health during the colder months.”

In conclusion, maintaining blood pressure levels during winter is crucial, and implementing these strategies can contribute to overall cardiovascular health.
